content.content:
Hey Backers!

Thanks for helping us get one step closer to bringing our project to life!

We're looking for help to spread the word about our campaign. We've opened up a referral program that allows you to grab a unique referral link to share with your friends. You can earn 15% commissions for any successful referrals that come through your link.
All you have to do is:
â‘ Head to our sign up page below and sign up to Boost our campaign
â‘¡Copy your unique referral link
â‘¢Share the link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
â‘£Refer to your dashboard to monitor your referrals and commissions!
https://organization-50.kickbooster.me/boost/zip-and-zap-on-bee-e-scooter
ï¼ˆPlease note that this offer is only valid for new referrals you bring to the project and will not be valid against your original pledge.ï¼‰
We appreciate all your help and can't thank you enough for being an early backer on this project.
Best regardsï¼Œ
